input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Ii Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Neo Tight'
  - Name='Assos H. Milleshorts Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Competizione Limited Edition Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Core Padded Short Cycling Bib'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Fiandre NoRain Pro bib short'
  - Name='Castelli Competizione Classico Bibshort LTD W/ Progetto X2 Air Seamless Chamois'
  - Name='Endura Men's Padded Liner II Sleeveless Bibshorts'
  - Name='Endura Women's FS260-Pro Dropseat Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura MT500 Protector Undershorts II Men's'
  - Name='Endura Men's Hummvee Short II'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Limited Men's Pro Team Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts II'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Competizione 2 Kit'
  - Name='Assos T Fi 13 S5 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos EQUIPE RS Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Men's PRO Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Man Sportful Giara 2 bibshort'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Pro Bib Short'
  - Name='Endura GV500 Foyle Short - Men's, Dirtbike Mtb Shorts - Slim Fit, 95% Nylon, 5% Elastane, DWR Coating, Secure Pockets, Breathable, Above Knee, Quick-'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Ii Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a high-end cycling bib short similar in function and design to the reference Pro Delta Bib, both serving as performance bib shorts for cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Neo Tight
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tight rather than a bib short, still cycling apparel but different silhouette and possibly less padding, less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos H. Milleshorts Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are shorts, not bib shorts, so they lack the bib construction; possibly similar in padding but lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Competizione Limited Edition Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-performance bib short comparable in construction and purpose to the Pedal Mafia Pro Delta Bib Black, suitable competitive cycling bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Core Padded Short Cycling Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Padded bib shorts but labeled as 'core' suggesting a more basic or entry-level option compared to the "Pro" bib; relevant but likely less performance-focused.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another high performance pro bib short very similar in intended use, fit, and design to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another high performance pro bib short very similar in intended use, fit, and design to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pro level bib short designed for rain protection, similar bib construction but with weatherproof feature; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Competizione Classico Bibshort LTD W/ Progetto X2 Air Seamless Chamois
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end performance bibshort with advanced chamois and similar construction, highly comparable to the reference bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Padded Liner II Sleeveless Bibshorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Padded bibshort liner likely intended to be worn under baggies rather than as standalone bibshorts; somewhat relevant but different use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Women's FS260-Pro Dropseat Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro level bib short for women with dropseat feature; similar high-end bibshort construction, slightly less relevant due to dropseat and gender targeting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura MT500 Protector Undershorts II Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Undershorts with protection pads rather than full bibshorts, more specialty protective gear than traditional bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Hummvee Short II
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mountain bike shorts, not bib shorts, and generally different cut and function; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core level bib shorts from Rapha, similar construction but likely less performance driven than the Pro team bibs.
